long_description: The KryptoFlex(R) 1004 cable is looped at each end, making it perfect for security when combined with quick-release components such as Kryptonite U-locks, disc locks and padlocks, sold separately. 4 ft. x 3/8 in. (120cm x 10mm) braided steel cable provides solid cut resistance. Protective vinyl cover.
short_description: The KryptoFlex(R) 1004 cable is looped at each end, making it perfect for security when combined with quick-release components such as Kryptonite U-locks, disc locks and padlocks, sold separately.
